item.title: Churchill Capital Stock Rallies After Citron Says Infleqtion Is ‘No Longer A Science Project’ Like Rigetti
item.description: The renewed attention followed Citron reiterating its view that Infleqtion’s business is commercially established rather than purely experimental.

item.title: AMC Is Stuck In A 10-Day Losing Streak — And Now The CEO Says A Side Bet On Hycroft Mining Stock Is Finally Paying Off
item.description: The remarks highlighted gains from AMC’s remaining Hycroft exposure at a time when the company’s shares remain under sustained pressure.

item.title: Instacart Pulls Plug On AI-Driven Grocery Pricing Tests After Shopper Backlash And Regulatory Scrutiny
item.description: The company said that retailers will no longer be able to use Eversight technology to run item price tests on Instacart.

item.title: DWTX Stock Heads For Worst Day In 9 Months As Chemotherapy Pain Drug Interim Study Data Fails To Boost Investor Confidence
